physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Physical examination revealed a large well-defined reddish brown verrucous plaque located on both buttocks, and satellite papules at the inner thigh. A reddish-brown, well-demarcated, hypertrophic and invasive verrucous plaque was presented bilaterally and symmetrically on the buttocks. Numerous well-defined reddish brown discrete papules were found symmetrically at the inner thigh. Demoscopy showed a sharply demarcated annular lesion with a thick, peripheral light brown rim, limiting an erythematous non-atrophic center with regular dotted vessels.
